```java
import json

import sys
from pathlib import Path

# Munge our sys path so libs can be found
CWD = Path(__file__).resolve().cwd() / 'lib'
sys.path.insert(0, str(CWD))

import requests

def get_users(event, context):
    user_response = requests.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users')
    users = {}
    for user in user_response.json():
        users[user['id']] = user

    post_response = requests.get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts')
    posts = []
    for post in post_response.json():
        user = users[post['userId']]
        posts.append({
            "id" : post['id'],
            "body" : post['body'],
            "title" : post['title'],
            "user" : {
                "id" : user['id'],
                "name" : user['name'],
                "phone" : user['phone'],
                "email" : user['email'],
                "username" : user['username'],
                "address" : user['address'],
                }
        })

    response = {
        "statusCode": 200,
        "body": json.dumps(posts)
    }

    return response
```

```java
service: api-proxy

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.6
  region: ${env:AWS_DEFAULT_REGION}

functions:
  GetUsers:
    handler: handler.get_users
```
